name: person_id
description: A foreign key identifier to the person for whom the data was recorded.

name: sleep_date
description: The date the sleep log ended

name: is_main_sleep
description: Defines a record as being the 'main sleep' record. Boolean value: true or false

name: level
description: The sleep level the user entered. The possible values returned for the sleep levels are: restless, asleep, awake, deep, light, rem, wake and unknown

name: start_datetime
description: Timestamp the user started in sleep level.

name: duration_in_min
description: Total number of minutes the user appeared in the sleep level.
